      • getParts

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Part> getParts()
        Loads the partData ObservableList that is tied to the Part TableView. It uses both In-house and Outsourced parts from their respective ArrayLists.
        Returns:
        ObservableList of parts.

      • getProducts

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> getProducts()
        Loads the prodData ObservableList that is tied to the Product TableView. It uses the iv.products ArrayList to populate itself.
        Returns:
        ObservableList of products.
